summary: A modern retail website for Jay Sports, a sportswear store. Features a homepage with hero section, product showcase, about section, and contact info with a bold, athletic design.
architectural_notes: Bold, athletic visual design theme suited for a sportswear brand

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with a full-width hero section featuring the Jay Sports brand name, a bold tagline, and a call-to-action button (e.g., 'Shop Now').
Create a product showcase section on the homepage displaying a grid of sample sportswear product cards, each with a product image placeholder, name, and price.
Create an 'About Us' section describing Jay Sports as a sportswear store, including a short brand story and mission statement.
Create a contact info section at the bottom of the homepage displaying placeholder contact details (address, phone, email) and a simple contact form with name, email, and message fields.
Add a sticky navigation bar at the top with the Jay Sports logo/name and links to each page section: Home, Products, About, and Contact.

Apply a bold, high-energy athletic visual theme across the entire site: use a dark background with vivid accent colors (e.g., electric red or neon orange), strong typography with heavy font weights, sharp geometric layouts, and dynamic section dividers to evoke a premium sportswear brand feel.

In the ContactSection component, update the placeholder address to the user's current address. Based on the selected elements (XPath: section[4] contact detail entries), replace the existing placeholder address text with: a real Indian address. Since no specific address was provided, use a realistic Indian placeholder address (e.g., '12, MG Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India') until the user provides their actual address.

In the ProductShowcase and ProductCard components, change all product price displays from USD ($) to Indian Rupees (₹). Update the six product prices shown in the product grid (selected elements XPath: section[2] product card price spans) to use the ₹ symbol and appropriate INR price values (e.g., ₹1,999, ₹2,499, ₹3,299, etc.).

In the ContactSection component, update the displayed phone number to '7006981592' (formatted as +91 70069 81592 or similar Indian mobile format). Replace any existing placeholder phone number with this real contact number.
In the ContactSection component, update the displayed email address to 'jaysports.in@gmail.com'. Replace any existing placeholder email with this real contact email address.
In the ContactSection component, update the displayed address to '196 - New Colony Ratnipora, Pulwama, 192304, Jammu and Kashmir'. Replace any existing address text with this new address.

Save the uploaded Jay Sports logo image (1771937030584.png) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/jay-sports-logo.png and use it as the logo image in the Navigation component, replacing the current text-only or placeholder logo. The logo should be displayed at an appropriate height (e.g., 48px) within the sticky navbar, maintaining its aspect ratio.

Ensure the application is fully built and deployed with all existing features intact, including the homepage hero section, product showcase with INR prices, about section, contact section with real address/phone/email, sticky navigation with the Jay Sports logo image, and the bold athletic visual theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change product prices to Indian Rupees (₹)
Add contact phone number 7006981592 to the contact section
Add contact form so customers can reach out directly from the website
Add email address jaysports.in@gmail.com to the contact section
Update contact address to: 196 - New Colony Ratnipora, Pulwama, 192304, Jammu and Kashmir
Add a custom logo image to the Jay Sports brand/navigation
